original_text: when the sin which they have committed becomes known, the assembly shall offer a bull from the herd for a sin offering and bring it in front of the tent of meeting.
korean_text: 그 범한 죄를 깨달으면 회중은 수송아지를 속죄제로 드릴지니 그것을 회막 앞으로 끌어다가

sentences.original_text: the assembly shall offer a bull from the herd
sentences.korean_translation: 회중은 소 떼에서 난 황소를 바쳐야 하고

sentences.original_text: and bring it in front of the tent of meeting
sentences.korean_translation: 그것을 회막 앞으로 끌고 와야 한다
